dependencies.description:
The ADAL for Python library makes it easy for python application to
authenticate to Azure Active Directory (AAD) in order to access AAD
protected web resources. DEPRECATED: replaced by MSAL Python.
dependencies.name: py-adal

dependencies.description:
The Microsoft Authentication Library (MSAL) for Python library enables
your app to access the Microsoft Cloud by supporting authentication of
users with Microsoft Azure Active Directory accounts (AAD) and Microsoft
Accounts (MSA) using industry standard OAuth2 and OpenID Connect.
dependencies.name: py-msal

dependencies.description:
The Microsoft Authentication Extensions for Python offers secure
mechanisms for client applications to perform cross-platform token cache
serialization and persistence. It gives additional support to the
Microsoft Authentication Library for Python (MSAL).
dependencies.name: py-msal-extensions

dependencies.description: AutoRest swagger generator Python client runtime.
dependencies.name: py-msrest

dependencies.description: AutoRest swagger generator Python client runtime. Azure-specific module.

dependencies.description: JSON Web Token implementation in Python
dependencies.name: py-pyjwt

dependencies.description:
High-level wrapper around a subset of the OpenSSL library. Note: The
Python Cryptographic Authority strongly suggests the use of
pyca/cryptography where possible. If you are using pyOpenSSL for
anything other than making a TLS connection you should move to
cryptography and drop your pyOpenSSL dependency.
dependencies.name: py-pyopenssl

dependencies.description: Python HTTP for Humans.
dependencies.name: py-requests

upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.
dependencies.name: py-setuptools
